site_name: 11 Keswick AvenueKingston ValeLondonSW15 3QH
description: Erection of double storey side extension, single storey rear and porch extensions. First floor side/rear extension. 2no rear dormer roof extensions with Installation of 2no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The proposed development, by reason of its scale, siting and design, would fail to appear subordinate or proportionate to the host dwelling, would unduly erode the gap to 9 Keswick Avenue, and would appear as an incongruous feature within the Keswick Avenue street scene, resulting in unacceptable harm to the character and appearance of the area. The proposal is therefore contrary to policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that Condition 21 (Pedestrian Environment Review Study PERS) of planning permission 22/02905/FUL is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.
